SEARCH
Package com.riskgame.model

Class Continent

java.lang.Object
com.riskgame.model.Continent
public class Continent extends Object
Contains details about continents like control value, color, countries, continent id. All countries belonging to this continent are stored in a HashMap, where key is country id and value is Country object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Continent

      public Continent()
      Constructor to initialize Continent object with default values.

    • Continent

      public Continent(String p_continentId, int p_controlValue, String p_continentColor)
      Creates Continent object with given arguments. This constructor will be used when loading .map files
      Parameters:
      p_continentId - Name of continent
      p_controlValue - Control value for continent
      p_continentColor - Color of continent

    • Continent

      public Continent(String p_continentId, int p_controlValue)
      Creates Continent object using continent id and control value (used in editMap). Default color is set to "000".
      Parameters:
      p_continentId - Name of continent
      p_controlValue - Control value for continent

    • editContinent

      public void editContinent(GameMap p_gameMap, Phase p_gamePhase, String[] p_args)
      Edit an existing continent.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object to add/remove continent to.
      p_gamePhase - GamePhase object to edit continent in.
      p_args - Command line arguments to edit continent.

    • removeContinent

      public boolean removeContinent(GameMap p_gameMap)
      Remove continent from map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object from which continent will be removed.
      Returns:
      Return true, if continent removed successfully, otherwise false.

    • isCountryRemovedFromContinent

      Checks if country removed from continent.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object.
      p_countryId - Name of country to be checked.
      Returns:
      Return true, if country removed from continent, otherwise false

    • editCountry

      public void editCountry(GameMap p_gameMap, Phase p_gamePhase, String[] p_args)
      Edit the country with given params.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object to which changes occur.
      p_gamePhase - Current game phase.
      p_args - CLI argument from user.

    • isContinentExist

      public boolean isContinentExist(GameMap p_gameMap, String p_continentId)
      Checks if given continent already exists in the game map. If not, adds continent in the map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object containing current states of continents and countries.
      p_continentId - Name of continent.
      Returns:
      Returns true if continent exists in the map, false otherwise.

    • isCountryExist

      public boolean isCountryExist(GameMap p_gameMap, String p_countryId)
      Checks if given country already exists in the game map. If not, adds country in the map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object containing current states of countries
      p_countryId - Name of country.
      Returns:
      Returns true if country exists in the map, false otherwise.

    • isContinentAdded

      public boolean isContinentAdded(GameMap p_gameMap, String p_continentId, int p_controlValue)
      Validates if the given continent can be added to the game map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameMap - GameMap object containing current states of continents and countries.
      p_continentId - Name of continent.
      p_controlValue - Control value of continent.
      Returns:
      True if continent can be added to map, false otherwise.
